title: Ferrari or Lamborghini, it's a luxury quite a few can afford
description: A Lamborghini booked now will be delivered only in 2026 or later, as the supercar maker has sold all units its Italian headquarters allocated for India. The company retails the Huracan, Urus and Revuelto in India, with the on-road price ranging from ₹5 crore to ₹10 crore.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
